snippet: A Lexington man has been charged with threatening to kill Gov. Steven L. Beshear, his wife and their family in a series of Facebook postings.
lead_paragraph: A Lexington man has been charged with threatening to kill Gov. Steven L. Beshear, his wife and their family in a series of Facebook postings.

headline.main: Kentucky: Facebook Posts Lead to Charges of Threatening Governor
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Facebook Posts Lead To Charges of Threatening Governor
